channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s CBS Settlement Win Is a Loss for America, Not Just the Media
item.description: This lawsuit was designed only to be used as a bludgeon, not to be won.

item.title: White House, Pentagon Won’t Say Why Admiral Who Allowed Drag Shows On Navy Ship Was Nominated For Promotion
item.description: President Trump recently recommended Rear Admiral Michael “Buzz” Donnelly, who is known for allowing drag shows on his ship when he was a captain, for...

item.title: Celebrate Religious Freedom Victories at SCOTUS This Independence Day
item.description: We have the right to live our faith openly in public life — and the American way is to extend that right to everyone.

item.title: After UPenn, These Nine Schools Should Apologize For Trans Policies Or Lose Funding
item.description: UPenn came to an agreement with the Depart. of Education not because it was the right thing to do but because it could have lost funding.

item.title: CIA memo criticizes report on 2016 Russian influence in Trump's election win
item.description: A new report from the CIA criticizes the way intelligence agencies, including the CIA itself under former Director John Brennan, determined that Russi...

item.title: Big, beautiful wins: Passage of sweeping tax cut legislation caps summer of victories for Trump
item.description: His critics said President Trump would find it impossible to pass his tax cut mega-bill through Congress, let alone get it done before the July 4 rece...

item.title: Trump says countries will start receiving letters from U.S. with new tariff amount
item.description: President Trump said he plans to send letters for each country that hasn't made a trade deal with the U.S. specifying how much tariff they will be lev...

item.title: Does Chess Need to Be ‘Trans-Inclusive’?
item.description: A controversy in Germany brings the maddening gender debate to a new setting.

item.title: Honduran family freed from detention after lawsuit against ICE courthouse arrests
item.description: A mother and her two young children from Honduras who had filed what was believed to be the first lawsuit involving children challenging the Trump adm...

item.title: Trump Wins Again. Big Beautiful Bill Headed To The President’s Desk
item.description: The signature domestic policy victory is another in a long line of brutal political butt-kickings Teflon Trump has delivered to the Democrats.

item.title: Trump’s New Budget Law: Very Big, Sometimes Beautiful
item.description: It may have been worth it to avoid a massive tax hike, but the failure to get spending under control will come back to haunt Republicans.

item.title: Republican Congressman Refuses To Say Why He Called Male Colleague A ‘Lady’
item.description: Republican Representative Steve Womack referred to his male colleague, who dresses as a woman, as a “gentlelady from Delaware” during Wednesday’s Big ...

item.title: On JD Vance, Restraint, and Reflexive Anti-Interventionism
item.description: A conservative American foreign policy is not one based on illusions or reflexive hostility to the use of power.

item.title: In 1976 We Celebrated America’s Bicentennial By Painting Fire Hydrants, And It Was Magical
item.description: We have reason to feel hopeful this Independence Day, as we are intentionally remembering our history. It mattered in 1976, and it matters now.

item.title: Supreme Court OKs Trump to deport illegal immigrants to South Sudan
